snippet: Some of the world’s foremost experts on crash investigations are in Kuala Lumpur, but technically only to assist the Malaysian government, and they are saying nothing.
abstract: Some of the world’s foremost experts on crash investigations are located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; experts, however, are limited to assisting Malaysian government and have offered little insight into disappearance of Malaysian Airlines Flight 370 as matter of protocol.
lead_paragraph: Some of the world’s foremost experts on crash investigations are in Kuala Lumpur, but technically only to assist the Malaysian government, and they are saying nothing.

headline.main: U.S. Takes Back Seat in Malaysian Jet Inquiry
headline.print_headline: U.S. Takes Back Seat in Jet Inquiry, at Least for Show
